long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Flappy Bird for Chrome Extension is a popular and addictive game that you can play for free on the website https://monkeymart.org/. In this game, you control a small bird and your objective is to navigate through a series of pipes by tapping on the screen to make the bird flap its wings and fly. The challenge lies in timing your taps correctly to avoid colliding with the pipes, as even a single collision will end the game. The gameplay is simple yet challenging, and the retro pixelated graphics add to its charm. Test your reflexes and see how far you can guide the bird through the obstacles in this fun and addictive game!

*Note: We have added "More Games" button, making it easy for players to quickly access the games on our website! https://monkeymart.org/
